Health and Productivity Solutions, LLC Privacy Policy

Last updated December 8, 2022

Scope of this Privacy Notice

Health and Productivity Solutions, LLC (“we”, “our,” or “us”) respects your privacy rights and wants you to be familiar with how we collect, use, disclose and store any personal information about you. Except where noted below, this Privacy Notice (“Notice”) describes our agreement with you (“you”) when you use our public-facing website hosted under the domain [www.hpsbraingym.com] (the “Website”), our mobile application (“App”), and our services provided through the Website and the App, including without limitation our Brain Health Coaching services and our Brain Gym services (referred to collectively with the Website and the App as the “Services”).

Please review this Notice carefully. By using any of the Services, you signify your agreement to this Notice. If you do not agree to this Notice, you may not use the Services.

We also encourage you to review our Terms of Use. The Terms of Use describe the terms and conditions for use of the Services and information about your responsibilities when using the Services. If you access or use this Website or any of our Services, you also accept and agree to be bound by our Terms of Use. Please refer to the Terms of Use for additional information about links to other websites and third-party services.

The Website is operated and intended only for the use of persons residing in the United States. The App is operated and intended only for the use of persons in connection with participation in an employer-sponsored program.

Information We Collect

We may collect certain personal information about you when you provide it to us while using the Website or other Services. Such information may include your name, home address or work address (or both), gender, age or year of birth, telephone and facsimile number(s), and email address. Other information we may collect about you when using our Services includes, without limitation, ethnicity, employer name, your role within your employer’s company, the number of years in your current position, and information you provide us about your well-being, habits and behaviors through surveys to which you respond when using the Services. When using the Website or App, we may also use or collect information about your browser and/or operating system type, domain names, access times, and the time zone of the portal to which you log in.

Note on Apple HealthKit Data

You can choose to connect and share your HealthKit information with us through the App. The information you provide to Apple HealthKit is governed by the Apple Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. The information you choose to send to us from HealthKit will be used as described in this Notice, and will not be used for marketing and advertising or transferred to third parties for marketing and advertising.

How We May Use this Information

We may use the information we collect about you for a variety of purposes, including to provide you with well-being plans to support your wellness goals as part of our Services; to provide your employer with de-identified, aggregate data showing trend and benchmarks related to the overall well-being of their employees; to renew, or modify our products and Services; to provide you with information that you request, or for other customer service related reasons; to provide you with information about our products and services; to improve the quality of products or services we provide, including your experience in navigating and utilizing the Services; to comply with applicable law; or to detect or prevent fraud, infringement, or other potential misuse of the Services. We may anonymize, aggregate or combine information we collect online for the above purposes, other purposes, and/or to analyze statistics on usage and trends. We may use anonymized data and aggregated data for any purpose and disclose such data to third parties in our sole discretion.

We may also use the information we collect for any other purpose we describe when we collect your information or to which you consent.

We May Share Your Personal Information

We also may share your personal information. We may share your information with affiliates for the purpose of offering you products or services that you may have interest in, and/or to effect transactions, products, or services that you authorize or request. We also may share your information with our contractors, processors, or service providers to the extent necessary to allow them to assist our business in providing our products or the Services, and/or to perform marketing services on our behalf, including to entities with whom we have joint marketing agreements. We may share your information, if necessary, in connection with a merger, consolidation, acquisition, divestiture or other corporate restructuring of all or part of our business. We may share your information for legal purposes, such as to protect and enforce our rights, to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, or if otherwise required or permitted by law.

We may also disclose the information we collect for any other purpose we describe when we collect your information or to which you consent.

Cookies

We use cookies on the Website to improve the Website’s functionality and to track information about how visitors use the Website. A cookie is a file that a website can place on your computer's hard drive for record-keeping or other administrative purposes. We may use cookies to help personalize your experience.

You may opt out of accepting cookies by changing the setting on your browser. However, by rejecting cookies, you may prevent your use of certain functions, and you may have to repeatedly enter information on the Website in order to take advantage of services or promotions. Please note that cookies can only read the identification number created by the random generator on your computer and can only retrieve information that is directly related to the Website. We may also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Website -- you can read more about how Google uses your personal Information here: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/. You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

NOTICE TO CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 13 AND THEIR PARENTS OR LEGAL GUARDIANS

HEALTH AND PRODUCTIVITY SOLUTIONS, LLC DOES NOT KNOWINGLY COLLECT PERSONAL INFORMATION FROM CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 13. CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 13 ARE SPECIFICALLY PROHIBITED FROM SUBMITTING ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION ON THE WEBSITE OR THROUGH THE SERVICES. IF YOU ARE UNDER THE AGE OF 13, DO NOT SEND ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS, NAME AND/OR CONTACT INFORMATION THROUGH THE SERVICES

Updates to this Notice

From time to time, we may modify or update this Notice at our sole discretion. Any such modification shall be effective immediately upon posting and without prior notice. We encourage you to review this Notice frequently for such changes. This Notice was last updated on the date listed above.

How to Contact Us

If you have questions about this Notice, you can contact us by email at support@braingymconnect.com.
